Dear Bob:
I apologize for the delay in replying to
your letter of January 14. That certainly does
not mean that we have been neglecting the
subject of a radio network.
We realize the need and some of the
problems, but are taking a very careful look
at this before taking any action. I know
Don Quayle and Bob Swezey are going to
meet with you soon to discuss this whole
project and I look forward to receiving their
preliminary conclusions.
